subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Jackson Bend and the exercise rider were going on a morning gallop when the 7-year-old gelding Little Nick ran into the 5-year-old horse at the Saratoga Race Course, Hall of Fame trainer Nick Zito said.
snippet: Jackson Bend and the exercise rider were going on a morning gallop when the 7-year-old gelding Little Nick ran into the 5-year-old horse at the Saratoga Race Course, Hall of Fame trainer Nick Zito said.
